title: MAG 101 - Another Twist Transcript
text:
IST 
So… S-So what do you want? 
HELEN 
I don’t know. Helen liked you so… there’s a lot to consider. But I will help you 
leave. 
ARCHIVIST 

Wait, is this… Mic— Y-You’re the Distortion, the, the, the Liar. How do I know 
this isn’t... a, a trick? 
HELEN 
And if it was, what would you do about it? 
ARCHIVIST 
…Right. Right... 
How long have I… b-been here? There’s no… It was hard to keep track— 
HELEN 
Time is hard, Archivist. It’s difficult to follow without a proper mind, especially 
here. A while. 
ARCHIVIST 
Right. 
HELEN 
The door is open if you're ready? 
ARCHIVIST 
No, not, not really, but... 
(The Archivist sighs.) 
[Static. The tape clicks off.] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro] 

JONATHAN SIMS

License. Today’s episode was written by Jonathan Sims and directed by 
Alexander J Newall. To subscribe, view associated materials or join our Patreon 
visit RustyQuill.com. Rate and review us online, tweet us @therustyquill, visit

listening.
